original_text: And strip Aaron of his garments, and put them upon Eleazar his son: and Aaron shall be gathered unto his people, and shall die there.
korean_text: 아론의 옷을 벗겨 그의 아들 엘르아살에게 입히라 아론은 거기서 죽어 그 조상에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: And strip Aaron of his garments
and put them upon Eleazar his son
and Aaron shall be gathered unto his people
